body:
Fr torryinabox
This was hands down my most favourite. So fucking wholesome. 10/10
Lmao how the fuck is the ending bittersweet? Settling down with someone you love and having a family is a negative how? Just sounds like you're upset about the doujin being straighter than you are.

This ending is really bittersweet.
I do want to see the alternative ending where Kyou changes back to being a male and well, fuck it. Be them gay. I don't care.
I didn't enjoy that ending at all.

Why I wasn't able to jerk off? 
Holy shit this made my dick confused.
Even tho it's wholesome, it's still gay for me
I was a fool for avoiding this one.
This was amazing better than most manga
this is kind of disappointing

I LEGITIMATELY didn't jerk off to this AT ALL, I was WAYY to engrossed in the story and the wholesomeness was so great that it made even the thought of jerking off to this a moral sin. 11/10 this was SO FREAKING wholesome 😭. Loved the story, Kyou is so adorable, Souji is a fxxking legend. Only wished that little tired got beaten up worse but honestly the whole thing from Kyou trying to figure out how to be a girl to him accepting it and finding happiness with Souji was just *chefs kiss* perfecto. Super wholesome, ending got me teary 😭

Ok no but the amount of wholesomeness in here is enough to make a grown man cry 😭. This shxt is so wholesome and the part where Kyou tells Souji to make him a woman (basically giving up on being a man for him) that shxt got me tearing up fr fr Bruce 😭😭😭, 11/10 this one. HANDS DOWN my favourite manga whatever you wanna call it, it's my favourite 😭😭😭
Why is this so wholesome tho? 😭, Kyou is so freaking adorable as a girl and the scenes where Kyous talking about his boob problems and when Kyous pouting is just too cute
2 hours of my morning that i won't get back... worth it completely, 10/10.
why is this so damn wholesome
Page 165 they just fuckin and he doin math
Why did it have to turn up so wholesome... I'm not gay but i'm cryin rn
Why am I crying?
I want to be loved like that 🥺😭
This is pretty good wow.
This is actually really good
This is so wholesome, im crying right now
Sus.....Seems it missing it's Yaoi tag...
This is so fucking wholesome im crying
The absolute chad who put Garnts quote at the end od the Doujin. That's off to you!
Im pretty fucking gay but goddamn this shit is fucking cute

for some reason the admin skipped the chapter 2 update of the Hasumi route (and other release too....) yet my last release is up in the last update here https://nhentai.net/g/396274/ , so if anyone wants to read it head over my server where I post the links where I originally upload my stuff https://discord.gg/Pgxebwgbb2
Why are gender benders so god damn wholesome...
Why are there so many tags for genderbend, I already excluded the main one how did this still pop up
9/10 really liked this one. story is quite wholesome. i just wish that we could get longer story, in which that genderchange would be just a part of story, not main theme
jeez that page count
and so a new masterpiece was born
9/10 freaking good but kinda disappointed he didn't beat that little shit down to its last atom still freaking wholesome ending tho made me teared up a bit damn 🤣

Came here expecting to find bronze and other lesser metals and stuck gold. This piece is magnificent, though not as well polished as other it holds a special place in my list due to its unique characteristic, that being the fact that the story is superb.

This is A FUCKING MASTERPIECE!! The plot was bloody well done. The sex scenes were just right. The most wholesome bromance with the marriage ending and children. I am absolutely stunned. I was grinning and in tears marveling at the end of the story. Words I'd say much more cannot formulate due to how astonished I am. This was simply the MOST AMAZING THING I've ever read in years. I will pay the artist that created this legendary artwork. Well done sir! Bloody well done! My hat goes off to you!
Ayo someone needs to tell Garnt about this
the most wholesome gayest yet technically non gay story
What's the difference between this and 392026?
What a masterpiece
This is beautiful, This little one cried a little.
A very wholesome story
Even adam fuck his own backbone we gae already
No thanks dude
this is atrocious
Is this gae? Am i gae?
It's wholesome and weird at the same time
This one is seriously so wholesome, and makes me so jealous of Kyou that I can't jerk it.
This is undoubtedly the best wholesome dojinshi/hentai i have ever read... I want more
Seeing shota/trap getting the shit beat out of him immediately made this a favourite.
A pretty wholesome story.
Anime adaptation when?
Might've been the longest I've read but it was fucking worth it
This was surprisingly wholesome

Im translating the Hasumi route too btw, the update of it should be up in this site like in half a day later, if you dont like waiting for them to update the site and go to where I upload the original translation, head over my server then
https://discord.gg/Pgxebwgbb2

Chapter 1 is already uploaded here though or if you want to check my other releases look up my name here https://nhentai.net/search/?q=uncle+bane

Sum1 rly likes genderbender huh, to draw almost 600 pages lol. Well, those closed-minded morons down there aside, i myself am rather open-minded, i wouldn't mind an ability to freely switch between genders and by doing so double my fun. ^^)
Remember even if your girlfriend turns into a boy, doesn't make it any less GAY if you want to bang him.
Remember even if your BFF turns into a gurl, doesn't make it any less GAY if you wanna bang him.
